results.title: Metformin ameliorates mitochondrial damage induced by C9orf72 poly(GR) via upregulating AKT phosphorylation.
results.text_hl: Taken together, our results indicated restoring mitochondrial function with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be a rational therapeutic strategy to reduce poly(GR) @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ in @GENE_C9ORF72 @GENE_203228 @@@C9orf72@@@ @DISEASE_Amyotrophic_Lateral_Sclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000690 @@@ALS@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Frontotemporal_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057180 @@@FTD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: METFORMIN: FROM DIABETES TO CANCER TO PROLONGATION OF LIFE.
results.text_hl: ...The @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ molecule dates back to over a century, but its clinical use started in the '50s.
